translation.en: ♪ She's True ♪ ♪ True! ♪
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪ ♪ Hero, hero! ♪
translation.de: Sie wünscht für dich und mich Heldin, Heldin

translation.en: ♪ She's True! ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom! ♪
-[laughing] -Hi, Mom.
Neverending Rainbow Day has started!
I wish it really was neverending!
Could you imagine a full-time rainbow carnival?
translation.de: Stell dir vor, ein ewiges Regenbogenfest!

translation.en: I think it means the rainbow is neverending, Bartleby, not the day.
translation.de: Der Regenbogen ist unendlich, Bartleby, nicht der Tag.

translation.en: Hmm... where do we start, B?
Easy. Breakfast!
[mumbling] Pancakes. Yummy-yummy.
Mmm! Blue, green, yellow, red...
Yup, they're all here.
[True] Bartleby, look! It's happening.
translation.de: Bartleby, schau. Es ist so weit.

translation.en: Happy Neverending Rainbow Day!
OK, what's next?
Let's try Rainbow Yeti Spaghetti.
How about the Rainbow Roller?
May I suggest a visit to Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight?
translation.de: Oder Dillydallys Diorama der dekorativen Daseinsfreude.

translation.en: -[True and Bartleby] Rainbow King! -[strums chord]
Happy Neverending Rainbow Day, your majesty.
And to you too, True and Bartleby.
So what's this dilly with the dazzly doodads...?
[chuckles] Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight!
It's full of the most wonderful treasures from all across the Kingdom.
translation.de: Das sind Schätze aus dem ganzen Königreich.

translation.en: Like this zookalele. My good friend Dillydally gave it to me.
translation.de: Wie diese Zukulele von meiner Freundin Dillydally.

translation.en: You know Dillydally, the Great Explorer?
Indeed I do.
She is one of my dearest friends. And we both love music,
translation.de: Sie ist meine Freundin. Wir beide lieben Musik,

translation.en: so she always brings me back a musical souvenir from her travels.
translation.de: darum bringt sie mir von Reisen stets ein Instrument mit.

translation.en: Can we meet her?
[laughs] Oh, goodness, no.
Dillydally went on an adventure to find a magical instrument
translation.de: Sie sucht seit einem Jahr ein Instrument

translation.en: at the end of the Neverending Rainbow last year.
She's been gone a whole year? No wonder they call her Dillydally.
translation.de: Seit einem Jahr? Das ist ja eine Trödeltante.

translation.en: Come to think of it, that is an awfully long time, even for Dillydally.
translation.de: Eigentlich ist das wirklich lang, selbst für Dillydally.

translation.en: I fear she may be... missing.
[both] Missing!
We have to go find her.
Jumping juniper! It's far too dangerous, True.
translation.de: Wuchernder Wachholder! Das ist zu gefährlich.

translation.en: Anyone who crosses the Neverending Rainbow
must be prepared to face anything,
and come back before sunset.
If anyone can find Dillydally and bring her back, it's me and Bartleby.
translation.de: Wenn jemand Dillydally zurückbringen kann, dann Bartleby und ich.

translation.en: Very well.
But remember... at sunset the Neverending Rainbow will vanish for another year.
translation.de: Gut. Aber bei Sonnenuntergang verschwindet der Regenbogen für ein Jahr.

translation.en: We'll move Kittynatti fast! Right, True?
translation.de: Wir sind schnell wie Kittynati! Stimmt's?

translation.en: First things first, we need some Wish help!
Oh, Cumulo!
Thanks, Cumulo.
We'll get you back to the carnival in time for the next ride.
translation.de: Du darfst gleich wieder zurück zum Fest.

translation.en: [True] To the Wishing Tree, please.
OK, Wishes. From the top...
[gasps] Musical Wishes!
True, Bartleby! You like jazz?
Listen to this!
We'd love to, Zee, but we're in a real hurry.
translation.de: Gern, Zee, aber es ist eilig.

translation.en: Yeah! We're going over the Neverending Rainbow. To find Dillydally.
translation.de: -Wir gehen über den Regenbogen. -Wir suchen Dillydally.

translation.en: The Great Explorer? As I remember, she never came back from her last expedition.
translation.de: Die Entdeckerin. Sie kam nie von ihrer Expedition zurück.

translation.en: Right. So we're heading over the Rainbow to find her.
translation.de: Wir gehen über den Regenbogen, um sie zu finden.

translation.en: That means you will have to come back by the end of the day.
What if you get stuck on the other side too?
We do have to hurry, Zee, but we'll be just fine,
translation.de: Wir beeilen uns. Mit der richtigen Wunschhilfe klappt es.

translation.en: as long as we have the right Wish help.
translation.de: Mit der richtigen Wunschhilfe klappt es.

translation.en: Absolutely!
Let's sit... and have a think.
translation.de: Absolut. Setzen wir uns... ...und überlegen wir.

translation.en: OK True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.de: Okay, wie kann der Wunschbaum helfen?

translation.en: Well, maybe Dillydally didn't come back
because she's trapped or needs some kind of help...
translation.de: Vielleicht sitzt Dillydally fest oder braucht Hilfe.

translation.en: We have to be prepared for anything.
Right, we don't know what you might find over the Rainbow.
translation.de: Ja. Wer weiß, was da drüben ist.

translation.en: We might not know, but the Wishing Tree always shares the right Wishes.
translation.de: Wir nicht, aber der Wunschbaum gibt die richtigen Wünsche.

translation.en: Then it's up to me to figure out how to use them.
translation.de: Ich muss sie dann richtig einsetzen.

translation.en: You always do, True.
The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
It is time to get your three Wishes.
I'm ready!
Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree,
please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
translation.de: Teile deine wundervollen Wünsche mit mir!

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪ Boo-ster!
translation.de: All die Wünsche Ich warte hier

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
Whompit!
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
Korokoro!
♪ Magic power ♪
♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
What an exciting ensemble of Wishes!
Now let's see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.de: Mal sehen, was die Wunschklopädie sagt.

translation.en: This is Boo-ster.
This one will really blow you away.
[Zee] Boo-ster can take a big breath and blow out a super-powerful jet of air.
translation.de: Puster holt tief Luft und bläst dann superstark.

translation.en: I can't wait to see you in action, Boo-ster.
Who do we have next?
Oh yes, this is Whompit.
[Zee] As you know, Whompit is a stomping Wish
that just loves to stomp and smash the ground.
Nice to see you again, Whompit. I don't know when we'll need your help,
but I'm sure we'll have a smashing good time!
And finally, we have Korokoro.
-Korokoro. -A super rare Wish.
[Zee] Korokoro has grippy powers. It can help you walk on really slippery surfaces.
translation.de: Korokoros Haftkräfte helfen dir auf rutschigem Untergrund.

translation.en: Amazing! I'm glad to have you with us, Korokoro.
translation.de: Toll. Gut, dass du dabei bist.

translation.en: Are you three ready for an adventure on the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.de: Bereit für ein Abenteuer auf dem Regenbogen?

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.de: Zoo, zipp, zapp, Wünsche in die Tasche!

translation.en: Thanks, Zee. We'll be back soon.
I'm counting on it.
Thanks, Cumulo! You should get back to the Carnival. We can walk from here.
translation.de: Danke, Cumulo. Flieg zum Fest. Wir gehen zu Fuß weiter.

translation.en: Yeah, it'll be nice to stretch our legs a bit...
Besides, how long could it take to cross the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.de: Und der Regenbogen ist sicher schnell überquert.

translation.en: [Bartleby] Skyblubbs? We must be really high up.
translation.de: Himmelsblubbs? Wir müssen weit oben sein.

translation.en: [pants] When are we going to get to the end of this neverending rainbow?
translation.de: Wann endet dieser Niemals endende Regenbogen?

translation.en: I can't believe Dillydally came all this way by herself.
translation.de: Dillydally ist ganz allein so weit gelaufen.

translation.en: I wonder what she was hoping to find.
translation.de: Was hoffte sie wohl zu finden?

translation.en: I'm hoping to find the world's biggest zazoony juice.
translation.de: Ich hoffe auf ein Riesenglas Zazoony-Saft.

translation.en: Mmm... super frosty with lots of ice cubes and-- A fork!
Um, I think a straw might work better for zazoony juice, True.
No, it's a fork in the rainbow. Look!
translation.de: Nein. Der Regenbogen gabelt sich. Schau.

translation.en: -Huh? -Which way should we go?
I've got this, True.
My tail always knows which way to go...
translation.de: Mein Schwanz weiß stets den Weg.

translation.en: That-a-way!
Why did your tail pick that path?
Easy. That other path has stairs.
Good call, tail. Let's go.
Well, it's nothing but smooth sailing from here on out.
translation.de: Von jetzt an geht es ganz flott.

translation.en: Right, True?
Uh-oh. What do you mean, "uh-oh"?
Oh, dear.
It's like walking a tightrope.
We just need to walk slow and steady.
-I got you, True! -Phew! Thanks.
This is trickier than I thought...
Ha! Not for a red-tabby Kittynatti.
Watch me, OK? And then just do what I do.
translation.de: Schau zu und mache es mir einfach nach.

translation.en: See True? Easy peasy, rainbow squeezy!
Hang on, B!
-I gotcha! -Phew.
You OK, Bartleby?
I am now. But I don't think I could have held myself up much longer.
translation.de: Ja. Aber länger hätte ich mich kaum halten können.

translation.en: [Bartleby] Whoa! We're high!
This could work if we do it together.
I'll hold you up, and you hold me up, OK?
translation.de: Ich halte dich. Und du hältst mich, okay?

translation.en: OK, you got it.
Steady...
Easy...
-OK, come on. -OK.
You can do it, True! Just don't look down!
'Cause we're up so high, and you don't want to get dizzy.
You don't even want to think about falling 'cause it'll be like...
translation.de: Nicht ans Runterfallen denken. Das wäre...

translation.en: [splat] Oh, I can't look!
-Done. -What?
We're here. We made it.
We did it! Go Teamwork, right?
translation.de: Jawohl! Wir sind ein tolles Team, was?

translation.en: Thanks, B. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation.de: Das ging nur dank deiner Hilfe.

translation.en: And look, we're almost at the top of the Rainbow.
translation.de: Und schau, wir sind fast oben.

translation.en: Yeah, we can handle anything this wacky Rainbow can throw at us.
translation.de: Wir schaffen es, egal was kommt!

translation.en: And I spoke too soon.
[gasps] Come on, we'd better be quick if we're going to beat that storm.
translation.de: Schnell. Wir müssen vor dem Gewitter oben sein.

translation.en: -[cloud grunts] -[True] Excuse me. Hi!
We really need to get to the other side of the rainbow.
translation.de: Wir müssen auf die andere Seite des Regenbogens.

translation.en: Could you please let us through?
Aw, you're stuck and you're too full of rain to move?
translation.de: Der Regen in dir ist zu schwer?

translation.en: What do we do, True? We can't just stroll through a lightening cloud.
translation.de: Was nun? Durch Gewitterwolken läuft man nicht.

translation.en: One wrong move and...
Not if we use some Wish power to blow it away.
translation.de: Wir blasen sie mit Wunschkraft weg.

translation.en: Time for my first Wish!
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.de: Zipp, zapp, zoo, ausgewählt bist du!

translation.en: Wake up, Boo-ster, Wish come true!
translation.de: Wach auf, Puster! Wunsch, werde wahr!

translation.en: Hi, Boo-ster. See that big storm cloud over there?
translation.de: Puster, siehst du die Gewitterwolke da?

translation.en: It's stuck on the rainbow and it needs our help.
Let's give it a push with your super strong wind!
translation.de: Helfen wir ihr mit deinem superstarken Windstoß.

translation.en: OK, Boo-ster... Blow, blow... blow!
-Look, it's-- -Ticklish.
One more time, Boo-ster.
-You're welcome. -Thanks for not zapping us.
Great job, Boo-ster! Now back in the pack!
translation.de: Klasse, Puster. Zurück in die Tasche.

translation.en: Whoa! Be careful, B. It's a little slippery...
I know this is fun and all...
[yelling] but we don't have any brakes!
Prepare for a crash landing!
We made it, B! This is the end of the Rainbow.
Dillydally must be somewhere on this island!
translation.de: Dillydally muss auf dieser Insel sein.

translation.en: -[distant tapping] -[gasps]
Listen. Do you hear a "tink-tink-tink"?
You must have cat ears, True.
I tink-tink-tink the tink-tink-tink is coming from over there!
translation.de: Das Tock-tock-tock kommt von da drüben!

translation.en: -[louder tapping] -[gasps] Bartleby, look!
It's her... Dillydally!
Huh? What?
Oh my! Are you two lost?
No, we're here to find you!
I'm True, and this is Bartleby. We're friends of the Rainbow King.
translation.de: True und Bartleby, Freunde des Regenbogenkönigs.

translation.en: Bouncing bongos!
Any friend of the Rainbow King is a friend of mine.
translation.de: Freunde des Königs sind auch meine Freunde.

translation.en: ♪ Welcome to the rainbow's end ♪
translation.de: Das ist das Ende des Regenbogens

translation.en: ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you, friends ♪
♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪
♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
Oh, dear.
♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪
♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
♪ Could use a stick un-stucker tool ♪ ♪ To help un-stuck that fuchsia jewel ♪
translation.de: Ich brauche was Um diesen Edelstein zu lösen

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
No!
♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.de: Da stimmt was nicht Mir fehlt ein Ton

translation.en: ♪ I tink tink tink and tonk tonk tonk ♪
♪ But no tink tonk will move that rock ♪
♪ It's my Dillydally kazoofa-flute And all it needs now is a... ♪
-Whoo-hoo! -Bravo! That was so fun.
Rainbow King would've loved that song.
Oh, Rainbow King... I miss him ever so dearly.
translation.de: Oh, Regenbogenkönig. Er fehlt mir so.

translation.en: I haven't seen him for a whole year.
I could never be away from True that long.
translation.de: Ich könnte nie ohne True sein,

translation.en: But you're in luck!
Because he sent us to find you and help get you home.
translation.de: Wir zeigen dir den Weg nach Hause.

translation.en: Don't be a silly slide whistle!
I'm not lost. I chose to stay here.
translation.de: Ich weiß den Weg. Ich will hier sein.

translation.en: I was collecting these magical crystals
translation.de: Ich sammelte Kristalle für eine Kazoofal-Flöte,

translation.en: to make a kazoofa-flute as a souvenir for Rainbow King.
translation.de: Ich sammelte Kristalle für eine Kazoofal-Flöte, als Geschenk für den König.

translation.en: But the very last crystal just won't budge so I'm missing a note.
translation.de: Weil der letzte Kristall sich nicht rührt, fehlt mir ein Ton.

translation.en: And I am not leaving without it.
What kind of a friend would I be
if I brought home a half-finished souvenir?
I do not think she's coming with us any time soon. Nuh-uh.
translation.de: Ich glaube nicht, dass sie mitkommt.

translation.en: We came here to rescue Dillydally, and we're not going home without her.
translation.de: Wir sollen Dillydally retten. Wir gehen nicht ohne sie.

translation.en: Uh, well we'd better hurry, True. The sun's gonna set soon
translation.de: Wir müssen hier weg, ehe die Sonne sinkt.

translation.en: and you, me and Dillydally will be stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.de: Sonst sitzen wir ein ganzes Jahr hier fest.

translation.en: OK, if Dillydally won't leave without the last crystal,
translation.de: Wenn Dillydally nicht ohne den letzten Kristall geht,

translation.en: maybe we can help get it out. Time for my second Wish!
translation.de: helfen wir, ihn rauszuholen. Zeit für Wunsch zwei!

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.de: Zipp, zapp, zoo, ausgewählt bist du!

translation.en: Wake up, Whompit!
-Whompit! -Wish come true!
Hi, Whompit!
We need your whompin', stompin' power to shake a crystal loose.
translation.de: Stampfie, wir brauchen deine Kraft, um einen Kristall loszustampfen.

translation.en: OK everybody, watch out!
-[loud thud] -[gasps] Clapping castanets! What was that?
Whompit's going to help you get that crystal out.
You might wanna stay off the ground for a little bit.
translation.de: Komm besser zu uns nach oben.

translation.en: Hop on!
Alright, Whompit.
Let's stomp, stomp, stomp it!
Almost!
Way to stomp it, Whompit!
Now back in the pack!
Wow! It made the rainbow glow.
That's the power of the Rainbow Crystals!
translation.de: Das ist die Macht der Regenbogenkristalle.

translation.en: Isn't this is the perfect souvenir for Rainbow King?
translation.de: Das perfekte Geschenk für den König, oder?

translation.en: He's going to love it, Dillydally.
And we're going to give it to him today, right?
translation.de: Und er kriegt es heute, oder?

translation.en: As in before the sun goes down?
[gasps] We might be too late!
[Dillydally] Without the sun, there will be no rainbow to take us home!
translation.de: Ohne Sonne gibt es keinen Regenbogen, der uns heimbringt.

translation.en: [gasps] Come on! Let's get moving.
It's way too steep.
Not for my super Kittynati rainbow grip!
Remind me to sharpen my claws next time.
Is there another way off this island, Dillydally?
translation.de: Gibt es einen anderen Weg von der Insel?

translation.en: I was going to figure that part out after I got the crystal.
So we're stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day?
translation.de: Wir sitzen also ein ganzes Jahr hier fest?

translation.en: Look on the bright side. We finished the kazoofa-flute!
translation.de: Aber dafür ist die Kazoofal-Flöte fertig.

translation.en: [Bartleby] What? I didn't even bring any Fishy Poof Crackers!
translation.de: Was? Ich habe keine Fisch-Knusperkekse dabei!

translation.en: No!
Still so many Fishy Poof flavors to try!
translation.de: Ich wollte noch so viele probieren!

translation.en: Come now, Bartleby. Get a grip on yourself.
That's it!
I have just the thing to help us get a grip.
translation.de: Ich habe genau das Richtige für uns!

translation.en: It's time for my third Wish!
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.de: Zipp, zapp, zoo, ausgewählt bist du!

translation.en: Wake up, Korokoro!
Wish come true!
Hi, Korokoro! We need your help to climb to the top of that super steep rainbow.
translation.de: Korokoro, wir brauchen deine Hilfe, um den Regenbogen zu erklimmen.

translation.en: Go, Korokoro!
Come on, hop in.
Now, we all need to run as fast as we can.
translation.de: Jetzt rennt so schnell wie möglich.

translation.en: [True] It's working!
Um, why is the Rainbow flickering?
The sun is setting.
We're running out of time!
Faster, everyone, faster!
Whoo-hoo! We made it to the top of the Rainbow! No more climbing!
translation.de: Wir sind ganz oben. Der Aufstieg ist geschafft.

translation.en: It's all downhill from here!
[Dillydally] I can see Rainbow City.
[Bartleby yells] The rainbow is fading! We're not gonna make it!
translation.de: Der Regenbogen verblasst! Wir schaffen es nicht!

translation.en: Dillydally! Your kazoofa-flute. Can you play it to keep the rainbow glowing?
translation.de: Kann die  Kazoofal-Flöte nicht den Regenbogen leuchten lassen?

translation.en: You betcha!
[Rainbow King] I should never have let them go over the Rainbow...
translation.de: Hätte ich sie bloß nie gehen lassen.

translation.en: Oh, gruesome grey, I miss them so much.
translation.de: Grausliches Grau, sie fehlen mir so.

translation.en: Wait! Could it be... ?
It's too late. The rainbow's gone.
translation.de: Zu spät. Der Regenbogen ist weg.

translation.en: [all] Oh no!
We're not going to make it, I don't think!
Terrific tambourines! You saved us.
translation.de: Traumhaftes Tamburin! Du hast uns gerettet.

translation.en: Of all the cushy, fluffy things I love... you're the best!
translation.de: Von allen flauschigen Dingen, bist du das beste.

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo! I knew I could always count on you.
translation.de: Danke, Cumulo. Auf dich ist immer Verlass.

translation.en: You too, Korokoro.
-Now back in the pack. -Whoo-hoo!
Grateful green!
Dillydally!
Rainbow King!
I missed you so much.
I was so worried about you, old friend.
I'm sorry I was away so long.
But I just couldn't come home without a special treasure...
translation.de: aber ich konnte nicht zurückkommen ohne etwas ganz Besonderes

translation.en: for you.
Fantastic fuchsia!
A Kazoofa-flute!
But Dillydally, as wonderful as your souvenirs are,
translation.de: Aber so schön deine Geschenke sind,

translation.en: there's no greater treasure than a true friend.
translation.de: der größte Schatz sind gute Freunde.

translation.en: Oh, Rainbow King, you're so right.
And I have two new friends who cared enough to come look for me.
translation.de: Und ich habe zwei neue Freunde, die extra nach mir gesucht haben.

translation.en: I'm sorry you missed your Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ihr das Fest verpasst habt.

translation.en: Well, not the whole day.
You didn't miss the grand finale.
Rocketing red and booming blue,
a special sight for me and you!
Here it comes! The best part of Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.de: Jetzt kommt das Beste vom Regenbogentag.

translation.en: Fill the sky with wondrous light,
find a friend and hug them tight!
translation.de: Sucht euch Freunde und umarmt sie fest.

translation.en: [Dillydally] ♪ Welcome to the Rainbow's End ♪
translation.de: Das ist das Ende des Regenbogens

translation.en: ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you friend ♪
♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪
♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
♪ I pucker up and give a blow ♪
[Dillydally] Oh.
